prefixDef.p: Analytical descriptors are considered to represent concepts from the DEPCHA bookkeeping ontology and can be extended to respective URIs.
Analytical descriptors are considered to represent concepts from the project-specific DEPCHA ontology and can be extended to respective URIs.
Analytical descriptors are considered to represent concepts from the historical units and currencies ontology and can be extended to respective URIs.

listPerson.head: Prosopography: Wheaton Family Business and Financial Papers
listPerson.desc: Built from names mentioned in documents in the Wheaton Family Papers MC001, Marion B. Gebbie Archives and Special Collections at the Madeleine Clark Wallace Library, Wheaton College. The first forty-one entries are based on Paine's biography of Eliza Baylies Wheaton. Entries 42 through 92 are based on on EBWdiaback file that was created by student researchers in 2005 and is used in Eliza Baylies Wheaton Diaries published in TAPAS. Entries 93 through 134 are also based on work of 2005 student researchers. Entries 135 and following are names from Laban Morey Wheaton's Day Book. The purpose of the new file is to bring supporting files for the Wheaton College Digital History Project into compatibility with TEI P5. Begun by Kathryn Tomasek in April 2010.

listOrg.head: Orgography: Wheaton Family Business and Financial Papers
listOrg.desc: Built from organizations mentioned in documents in the Wheaton Family Papers MC001, Marion B. Gebbie Archives and Special Collections at the Madeleine Clark Wallace Library, Wheaton College, Norton, Massachusetts. This file is based in part on EBWdiaback file that was created by student researchers in 2005 and is used in Eliza Baylies Wheaton Diaries published in TAPAS. The purpose of the new file is to bring supporting files for the Wheaton College Digital History Project into compatibility with TEI P5. Begun by Kathryn Tomasek in April 2010.
